headline: Is Equifax (EFX) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Equifax is fairly priced or if the current share price leaves room for upside, this article walks through the numbers so you can judge the value story for yourself. Equifax recently closed at US$208.96, with returns of 5.8% over 7 days, 3.8% over 30 days, a 2.4% decline year to date and a 14.2% decline over 1 year. The 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 2.7% and 27.3% respectively. Recent market attention on Equifax has been shaped by ongoing interest in credit...
